description.value:
This oak branch grows leaves in spring that change color in autumn and shed in winter. While wielding it, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify plants and fungi.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrips @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Tangle Vine]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Runic Body], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Runic Weapon]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Entangling Flora], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Oaken Resilience], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.One with Plants], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shape Wood]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Thorns], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Speak with Plants]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Oaken Resilience], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Speak with Plants]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Plant Form], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Thorns]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
